summary: In 1958, in the French Alps, a young servant, Anna Jurin, arrives at Saint Ange Orphanage to work with Helena while the orphans are moved to new families. Anna, who is secretly pregnant, ... See full summary »
cast: Virginie Ledoyen|Lou Doillon|Catriona MacColl|Dorina Lazar|Virginie Darmon|Jérôme Soufflet|Marie Herry|Eric Prat|Marin Chouquet|Christophe Lemaire|Louis Thevenon|Franck Vestiel
title: El internado
